verses.verse: מִזְמ֗וֹר <WH4210> miz-Mor, A Psalm לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <WH1732> le-Da-Vid of David הָב֣וּ <WH3051> ha-Vu Give לַֽ֭יהוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei sons אֵלִ֑ים <WH410> 'e-Lim; of the mighty הָב֥וּ <WH3051> ha-Vu give לַ֝יהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD כָּב֥וֹד <WH3519> ka-Vod glory וָעֹֽז׃ <WH5797> va-'Oz. and strength

ק֥וֹל <WH6963> Kol The voice יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- is over הַ֫מָּ֥יִם <WH4325> ham-Ma-yim [is] upon the waters אֵֽל־ <WH410> 'el- the God הַכָּב֥וֹד <WH3519> hak-ka-Vod of glory הִרְעִ֑ים <WH7481> hir-'Im; thundereth יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- is over מַ֥יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim waters רַבִּֽים׃ <WH7227> rab-Bim. [is] upon many

קוֹל־ <WH6963> kol- The voice יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD בַּכֹּ֑חַ <WH3581> bak-Ko-ach; [is] powerful ק֥וֹל <WH6963> Kol the voice יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD בֶּהָדָֽר׃ <WH1926> be-ha-Dar. [is] full of majesty

ק֣וֹל <WH6963> Kol The voice יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD שֹׁבֵ֣ר <WH7665> sho-Ver breaketh אֲרָזִ֑ים <WH730> 'a-ra-Zim; the cedars וַיְשַׁבֵּ֥ר <WH7665> vay-shab-Ber breaketh יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh yea the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אַרְזֵ֥י <WH730> 'ar-Zei the cedars הַלְּבָנֽוֹן׃ <WH3844> hal-le-va-Non. of Lebanon

וַיַּרְקִידֵ֥ם <WH7540> vai-yar-ki-Dem He maketh them also to skip כְּמוֹ־ <WH3644> ke-mov- like עֵ֑גֶל <WH5695> 'E-gel; like a calf לְבָנ֥וֹן <WH3844> le-va-Non Lebanon וְ֝שִׂרְיֹ֗ן <WH8303> ve-sir-Yon, and Sirion כְּמ֣וֹ <WH3644> ke-Mo like בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- like a young רְאֵמִֽים׃ <WH7214> re-'e-Mim. unicorn
קוֹל־ <WH6963> kol- The voice יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD חֹצֵ֗ב <WH2672> cho-Tzev, divideth לַהֲב֥וֹת <WH3852> la-ha-Vot the flames אֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> 'Esh. of fire

ק֣וֹל <WH6963> Kol The voice יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD יָחִ֣יל <WH2342> ya-Chil shaketh מִדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> mid-Bar; the wilderness יָחִ֥יל <WH2342> ya-Chil shaketh יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD מִדְבַּ֥ר <WH4057> mid-Bar the wilderness קָדֵֽשׁ׃ <WH6946> ka-Desh. of Kadesh

ק֤וֹל <WH6963> Kol The voice יְהוָ֨ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD יְחוֹלֵ֣ל <WH2342> ye-cho-Lel to calve אַיָּלוֹת֮ <WH355> 'ai-ya-lOt maketh the hinds וַֽיֶּחֱשֹׂ֪ף <WH2834> vai-ye-che-Sof and discovereth יְעָ֫ר֥וֹת <WH3295> ye-'A-Rot the forests וּבְהֵיכָל֑וֹ <WH1964> u-ve-hei-cha-Lo; and in his temple כֻּ֝לּ֗וֹ <WH3605> kul-Lo, everything אֹמֵ֥ר <WH559> 'o-Mer doth every one speak כָּבֽוֹד׃ <WH3519> ka-Vod. of [his] glory

יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD לַמַּבּ֣וּל <WH3999> lam-mab-Bul upon the flood יָשָׁ֑ב <WH3427> ya-Shav; sitteth וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <WH3427> vai-Ye-shev sitteth יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh yea the LORD מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech King לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> le-'o-Lam. for ever

יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD עֹ֭ז <WH5797> 'oz strength לְעַמּ֣וֹ <WH5971> le-'am-Mo unto his people יִתֵּ֑ן <WH5414> yit-Ten; will give יְהוָ֓ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD יְבָרֵ֖ךְ <WH1288> ye-va-Rech will bless אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עַמּ֣וֹ <WH5971> am-Mo his people בַשָּׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> vash-sha-Lom. with peace
